body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug

**What happened**:
The change here removes exiternal id, but the call to instance id was not made used at all, it will always return false.
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/60692/files#diff-a1ff61328540d76c791d919f71da4ad5R423

```
// MonitorNode here, calls ensureNodeExistsByProviderIDOrInstanceID, but provider id is not populated
I0427 02:48:54.917288       1 node_controller.go:260] Deleting node since it is no longer present in cloud provider: k8s-master-40525011-0
I0427 02:48:54.917319       1 node_controller.go:268] Recording DeletingNode event message for node k8s-master-40525011-0
I0427 02:48:54.917644       1 event.go:218] Event(v1.ObjectReference{Kind:"Node", Namespace:"", Name:"k8s-master-40525011-0", UID:"7b9fc07c-49c5-11e8-abb4-000d3a179d0f", APIVersion:"", ResourceVersion:"", FieldPath:""}): type: 'Normal' reason: 'Deleting Node k8s-master-40525011-0 because it's not present according to cloud provider' Node k8s-master-40525011-0 event: DeletingNode

// AddCloudNode here, provider id is populated
I0427 02:48:55.147050       1 node_controller.go:375] Adding node label from cloud provider: failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/zone=0
I0427 02:48:55.147127       1 node_controller.go:379] Adding node label from cloud provider: failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/region=ea

// Trying to set provider id, but the node was just removed.
E0427 02:48:55.240801       1 node_controller.go:396] nodes "k8s-master-40525011-0" not found
```

At this time no node was able to register

**What you expected to happen**:
ProviderId was used in check `ensureNodeExistsByProviderIDOrInstanceID`



**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:


**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11+", GitVersion:"v1.11.0-alpha.1", GitCommit:"4761788b2afa42a4573a6794902eb93fe666d5c5", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-04-19T19:25:45Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"11+", GitVersion:"v1.11.0-alpha.1", GitCommit:"4761788b2afa42a4573a6794902eb93fe666d5c5", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2018-04-19T19:25:45Z", GoVersion:"go1.10.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Cluster Lifecycle.
labels.name: sig/cluster-lifecycle

title: [Cloud controller manager] Node got deleted before providerId is set
